setImage(image: string) { this.selected_image = image; console.log(image); } async ngOnInit(): Promise{ const response = fetch('https://localhost:44492/home',{method: 'GET'}); if (!(await response).ok) { throw new Error(`Error! status: ${(await response).status}`); } console.log((await response).json()); } } Document
